评论概述: I really wanted to love this
评论详情: The dress itself looks so cute, the zipper is unusable, so I have never been able to wear it.
I love how the dress is fashionable, but also casual. It’s also very cozy.

Dress is a comfortable material and is not itchy. It is not too tight feeling and has a flattering waist. Material is thick and warm, good for winter time. The back has a zipper and two buttons at the top, a bit tricky to reach but doable. Overall a good deal!
I'm 140 lbs 5'3" and this dress fit me like a dream. I got so many compliments on it too. I'm truly obsessed.
Love the collar and the open back! The neck is loose on me but the waist and bust Is perfect, the fabric is sturdy and high quality
Quality is good but it is very short.

The dress itself is very nice - high quality fabric & seems to be well made. I ordered it on 12/2/24 hoping to wear for Christmas. It took almost a month to get it - came 4 days after Christmas. Not used to that kind of service in products ordered from Amazon.
Very cute dress however ordered a XL and the waist was more the size of XS.
The dress is not proportionate, nor flattering.
I like it but it doesnt look like I thought it would. I feel like this dress only looks good on skinny girls. It’s not as well made as I thought it would be.
Fits well, sized correctly.

The description of this dress says it's 57% cotton. With the dress in my hands I can tell you that's a blatant lie. It's 100% plastic. It feels more plasticy than my 30% cotton work shirt. If you have sensory issues like me and can't stand plastic clothing, don't buy this dress. It's a waste of thirty dollars you could use to buy fabric to make your own dress.
I'm so happy with it! Not too short, and I'm 5'7", 170lbs, size XL fits great. The fabric has a bit of stretch. Nipped in at the waist, very cute.

I love this dress! I ordered it on a whim thinking that it wouldn't fit me (5'1, 130lbs, carry most of my weight in my tummy), but!! BUT!! IT DID FIT! I ordered the XL though honestly, I didn't need to. It's stretchy! I have room to spare and when I put it on, I didn't even need to unzip the dress in the back. L would have fit me fine. Y'all have no idea how hard it is to find dresses that suit me...Anyway, I love it! It doesn't have any pockets though, but it's such a cute dress. Also, it's kind of hefty as a dress, I didn't expect the fabric to be so heavy. Don't let that deter you if this is your aesthetic! Go for it!

I was so excited for this dress after reading success stories from other larger girls, however, I couldn't zip it up at all. I got an XL to be safe and still couldn't zip past my lower ribcage. I'm usually a L in shirts, less than 200lbs, and only a Bcup so it was a shock to see it be such a struggle to fit. The dress otherwise seemed like nice construction and quality. I wish they had an XXL for me to order instead.
I love how thick the fabric is and we'll made it is. It comes dipped in chemicals though so wash before wearing. Super short in back fyi.

The fabric is heavy and feels good to wear. It's long enough to go to my knees and I'm 5'7. True to size My only issue is the clasps being hard to fix. If you have joint issues, it's not a friendly product lol

Extraordinary quality! I was expecting something cheap and thin, but the material is thick, heavy, and much higher quality than most other “Amazon” items. I do have a harness over the dress in the photo but it tapered waist fit amazingly and is very flattering- I just wanted to spice up the look a bit! I’m 5’6 at ~130lbs and a Medium fit perfect. GET THE DRESS!!! You won’t regret it!
I adore this dress. it's my go to for work. I just wish it came in more colors!

It’s so comfy and fits me so well. I wore it with a corset belt to uni today and got so many compliments! I feel empowered and beautiful in it. The material is very high quality and the zipper and buttons are very easy to secure and don’t come undone
Quality fabric and well made

This is a beautiful dress that can be worn any way one chooses, just make sure you do your hair in a style that will compliment the dress up or down. It’s very flattering once you put it on. I’m normally a size medium and have big boobs, I ordered a small and it fits perfectly. I also have a very small back/bone structure.
I'm obsessed with this dress. A+

评论概述: I’m a boy but I still love it
评论详情: It fits nicely and makes me feel so cute and small

It’s very cute! The material is decently thick and stretchy! The print on it is a little different than I expected, but I still like it. Quality wise there were a bunch of loose threads on the neck buttons and they seem really flimsy. Plus the big buttons barely fit in the tiny sewn on loops.  The main issue is how short it is especially in the back. It BARELY covers anything and if I move at all you’d see… everything. It’s cute so I guess I’ll just wear opaque tights with it, but it’s definitely going to need shorts under if you don’t want to do that.

I’m 5’7” and 150lbs. I have a leather harness on (sorry!) but the fabric’s accentuating waist cinch is one is my favorite part of this dress. The cuffs are loose (I have smaller wrists) and the sleeves are long, like it that way. The bottom of the dress rises above my knees about 5 inches and the fabric in the back is slightly longer, which is great if you have a little more junk in your trunk. I’m assuming the dress is polyester but it’s soft and not scratchy whatsoever. I have small breasts so it doesn’t hug my chest, I love that too. This was a birthday gift from me to me and I’m so pleased. Thank you!

Bought this dress 3 years ago and I'm going to wear it again for Halloween as a witch. And the reason why is that I never like the other dresses because it doesn't look good and bad quality. But this gothic dress is the best thing I ever had. It's not cheap quality, worth the money. It stretches very smoothly and comfortably. Usually, skirts don't fit on me, but the length of the skirt is perfect for my thick legs and butt. It also helps to show my curves more.

I ordered a large, it was okay up top as I don't have a large chest but my hips are wider so it was kind of tight. I'm about 5'7 and 160lbs. It was also very short, if I would have worn it in front of people they would have been flashed.

I'm 5'6, 190 lbs, large chested and fairly curvy. I would say that this dress is better suited to smaller chested women, just because of the way it's proportioned. On me, it looked a little schlubby, so I returned it. But the fabric is nice and thick and on a different body type I could see it being a total winner!

This dress is really cute and fits well. Material is nice. My only complaint was that the little band that holds the buttons broke immediately after a gentle tug. This led to the neckline looking a little odd.
Great quality and fits my body well and comfortably!
Super cute! A lot baggier in appearance than I thought. The zipper functions well and there is no struggle when zipping it. The fabric feels thick and definitely worth the price.

评论概述: Warning: sipper is on the back!!
评论详情: Good quality but go a size up over, from what you would normally choose because it is a tight dress. Doesn't stretch.
The reviews were spot on! The zipper is hard to zip. The material is good quality, and heavier than you think. It is a lot shorter in person. My only complaint is the sleeves were too long for me.
Such a pretty dress! I got so many compliments. It's really well made, good quality, and the waist seems to be designed to have a slimming effect. I love it!

It's a very good dress, and very pretty, but by the second day I wore the dress, the zipper broke. I was just sitting in my seat and bent over, and it broke. It a good dress over all but I just want y'all to be aware of that!

This dress is adorable! Really comfy, and fits me perfectly. It’s quite heavy material, and not cheap at all. I’ve gotten so many compliments about it. It doesn’t wrinkle very easily, and it’s accentuating to your figure.
Great fit. True to size. Just lovely
This is a heavy material good material. A little short but what I expected. There’s a zipper in the back that goes up to mid back. Gives you a good shape. Overall love the dress.

评论用户: Received with parts missing. I reached out to the manufacturer for support. Sad that we wanted our kitty to have something on Christmas too.
评论详情: Very flattering. Material is very nice. It has a bit of stretch, just enough to zip. True to size. A little hard to zip even if it's a perfect fit but thats absolutely worth the end result. I was worried it would be too short. Bought for my daughter and I am ok with the length. I love it and she loves it. Amazing price for the quality
This runs small and the material is much thicker than I thought it was going to be.

评论概述: I get lots of compliments wearing it

I love this dress but the zipper is a pain in the butt to get up.
I’m 5’9” and it falls just below my butt It’s still cute though

No regret, would buy 200x over. I will say for someone with a long torso and a D cup it’s slightly off, like I have to wear a sports bra with it, but that’s if I’m being uber picky. For sure favourite piece in my wardrobe

评论详情: Love the dress fit and the fabric. Unfortunately, I have washed it 3 times and still can't get rid of the weird chemical smell from the manufacturer.

评论概述: Higher Quality than expected but very short
评论详情: I was very impressed by the quality of the fabric and stitching. It looks amazing but it’s so short in the back that anyone with any booty will be flashing everyone and it’s not like a “you just need tights” level.

The appearance and quality was fantastic. It felt like a high quality garnet. Felt heavy and well made. However its not very friendly for bigger sizes. I can wear a large/XL depending on the item usually. I got the xl and had trouble zipping it. If I could get a bigger size I would and it would be perfection. It needs more sizing options.

评论概述: Pretty, heavy weight, needs better spec
评论详情: Very pretty blouse but surprisingly heavy all ploy fabric; definitely not Spring friendly. Spec is off on neck and sleeve bands; sloppy fit in these areas & I wish it closed all the way up the back for modesty.
I wore this to my college graduation and it was soo cute!! Loved it good quality!
If you’re looking for a cute dress, than you’re in the right place. It’s snug, fits well, and isn’t too short nor too long. I’d reccomend
In my opinion, this dress is not the best for extreme cold weather. On the other hand, I did enjoy the stretchiness of the fabric. I received many compliments when I wore it.

I love this dress! It fits wonderfully & super flattering - the ONLY thing which it’s sadly on my part, I got the zipper disconnected so I wish there was a connect at the bottom instead of glued together for an easy fix. That’s my only complaint about the dress. So careful with zipper!
It’s such a European style vibe. Very cute. I’m tall so I wore stockings to not draw so much attention to my legs. But very cute dress. Has a interesting smell to it but still cute.
It's cute looking and fits on top but if you have a bigger butt it is Not made for you. It's short and the same length in the front as it is in the back 😅
Was sent the wrong size, had to return

评论概述: Get it. Do it. You won't regret it.
评论详情: I thought for sure based on the size chart it was gonna be too small. I pulled it out of the bag, looked it over, and said "ok, go slowly, be prepared to hear some seams snap." Nope! It slid right on and SNATCHED my waist/underbust. I'm shocked at how sturdy it is because the stitching looks very delicate. It is soft and gorgeous and stretchy! I don't even think I'll need shapewear, the fit is super flattering, hides all the wrong curves and makes all the right ones pop. Please make more colors, I'm in love with this dress and need more. As others have said, the only thing that could be different is the neck line being a little loose, but I could easily restitch the buttons to get a tighter fit around the neck. So so so glad I got this.
True to size, nice fit.I would recommend it

评论概述: Runs very small and you have to pay to ship back to china
评论详情: Sizes run very very small. Dress was Much shorter than what was pictured.  The return was a little weird.  They send an email saying your approved but you wait longer for a shipping lable to show up.  Not sure how much it will cost to send back but thinking it will be half of my return.I have two to send back.  A third one I just canceled because of the hassle

评论概述: Very cute! A bit delicate though
评论详情: The dress fit really well, although it was a bit snug around the waist. I would also go up a size if you’re more on the curvy size especially around the bust. The skirt is also a tad short, but I just layer mine. The sleeves are nice and roomy! The material feels pretty nice. Not super soft but not scratchy either. I will warn though to be very gentle with the buttons! They’re just elastic bands and mind broke pretty much instantly. At least it’s still super cute even without them, haha!

It doesn't fit. I'm a 16-18 and it doesn't zip up in the back. Also, I'm 5'9", so it shows my butt even without bending over. 😮‍💨 I would definitely buy this dress again after losing some weight, but for now... I must return it.  I don't know why the seller (or Amazon) "updated" my charge amount from the original $32 to $60 after I started my return. Seems fishy. I'm going to call Amazon and update y'all on what happened there.

The fabric is actually a lot thicker than I thought it would be. It's like slick, business casual material. Unfortunately, it's too short to wear to work, but that's not what I bought it for. I just love dual-purpose pieces. With some warm tights, it'll be perfect for casual fall walks. It's very flattering and comfortable.

评论概述: This is not cotton at all, pure poly.
评论详情: The reason I bought this dress was because it fit the character I’m going to be for Halloween, and because I didn’t want to throw it away after one use. I spent a long time on Amazon trying to find a mostly cotton dress, because I don’t want to harm the environment with poor choices. 0/5 for material. This is pure polyester, there isn’t a bit of cotton in it. 2.5/5 for fit, I saw it might not fit when looking at the measurements so sized up. I’m normally on the larger side of medium, but a medium non the less. The large barely fit me. Quality is 4/5, for what it is the sewing is actually nicely done without corners cut and the polyester they used wasn’t “cheap”, it’s thick polyester not thin shit. This is not elastic at all, it also has a zip/button enclosure on the back.

评论概述: Please make more dresses like this!
评论详情: I almost never buy clothes online, but after reading the reviews I gave it a shot and so happy I did! This is a perfect dress. I'm 5'3" 113 lbs, 32C and this fits like a dream. Everything hits at the right spots, not too tight nor too loose. The dress length is flattering with tights - sexy without being slutty. I also love the material, it's very comfortable.  I was worried the long sleeves would cause me to sweat when indoors, but surprisingly it didn't! I guess the fabric breathes well. And price is right! A rare find.

It is slightly shorter than I expected, but it's not the hem length. The waist part was slightly higher up than expected as well. I'm sure for smaller or medium sized breasts it will fit as expected, just expect it to be lifted 2-4 inches higher than depicted if you're in a D cup or bigger. This was not an issue for me, I don't mind it being a bit shorter as I tend to wear it with stockings/tights anyway but if you're super conservative or trying to wear this to school as a teen and length is an issue, I figured it would be nice to be aware of. The material is nice in texture, so it feels great on your skin AND washes easily. Spills just wipe right off. Even cat hair is easy to just wipe off. It's super super cute and I love it.
Want to hide a not so flat stomach? This is the winner. Looks so cute. I’ve gotten tons of compliments.
I love it! It's a little stretchy, so it's really comfortable even though the waist is cinched. I'm 5'2 and around 112lbs and the small fit great.
Would have gotten a 5/5 but the neck is loose. It’s comfortable, and really good quality, but the neck is loose. ✨

I REALLY like this dress! It is a higher quality material than I was expecting. I am short, and have a shorter torso and this cuts perfectly almost making me look longer in the torso. It is on the short side so I will probably wear black shorts underneath. The arms are a little longer on me but don't look bad at all. Honestly can't wait to wear it out ☺️

Very cute and insanely flattering. One of the neck buttons broke as soon as I tried it on, and the back is a little short and makes the dress end up looking like a big t-shirt just a little bit.  I still LOVE this dress. It's so cute and comfortable. I went to an outdoor wedding in the midst of summer in Texas and was comfortable the whole time.  The only downside I can think of is there's no pockets, but that's no surprise and I wasn't expecting any.

I’m 5”4 and 190 pounds. I ordered a XL to leave some breathing room in the dress. It arrived and I was so Stoked, I knew this dress would be so cute. But when i put it on, it didn’t even go over my butt! It just looked like a blouse. Nonetheless I’m super disappointed in this product and definitely needs to have corrected measurements and sizing. I’m not sure if I was sent the wrong size because this is definitely not an XL.
Great quality, really cute dress, gave it as a gift and she loved it.
The dress is cute but the fabric look very cheap

there’s nothing else to say, it’s just good! It’s soft, fits well, and didn’t shrink in the wash.  EDIT: I GET IT. YOUR EMO. YOUR HAVING AN EMO PHASE. PLEASE DONT BE EMO IN THIS. I REGRET IT SO MUCH. I BEG OF YOU.
Cute dress but it’s way too short for me. They’ve also made it super difficult to return so it’s just sitting at the bottom of my closet with no use now. :(
Got this dress in an XL, even though I wear a medium now. Still was way too tight, which made me sad because it's so cute!!!! If you're small and short, you will LOVE this dress. :)

评论概述: Takes a while to arrive, but totally worth it!
评论详情: Comfortable and cute! I could wear this forever! :)

fits great and looks good. i have a bit of belly and this dress hides it. stretchy enough to be comfortable and fit well. have gotten compliments on it. only thing i didn’t like was the smell but washing will help with that.
i’m 5’4 & won’t wear it as a dress since it’s too short but i love it! it’s super cute!

definitely a must

评论概述: Super Cute for the Price Point
评论详情: A very cute and flattering casual dress. Size small fits perfectly.

I usually do not buy clothes off Amazon as different sellers mean different results BUT this fit my usual sizing, the material is slightly stretchy, and the material is feels nicer than I expected! It looks so cute on and is my next date outfit for sure :) If 30 bucks won’t break the bank, I’d give it a try!
I love the fit of this dress, it's super comfy and not tight at all, the baggy sleeves are sooo cute, love this fit! I'm short, (5'3) so the length is perfect for me

评论概述: If you have a more curvy body it might for short
评论详情: I love this dress and think it is the cutest thing! Only downside is I have a slightly larger bum and so it ended up being a bit short in the back. I recommend wearing shorts under it

Just got this dress in the mail today! It is super cute. I love the the waist is sinched in so it gives a sort of hour glass shape. I am 5'8" and 170lbs and I got the large. It fits nicely, although it is a little snug. I probably should have gotten an xlarge, but I like the snug fit. The only other complaint is that the skirt portion of it is super short. I will definately need leggings under it. So be warned if you are tall. But, it is super cute! Looks good on me and I love the design. Material is not my favorite texture, though.

I honestly didn’t know what to expect from this dress based off the mixed reviews but I love it! The material is soft and buttery. It is a bit short in the back which is why I went with a large instead of a medium. Unfortunately the large is a little loose around the neck and I would’ve preferred it a little more snug but it’s still adorable!
Overall the dress is cute and fit nicely, however, it strongly smelt like cigarette smoke so I will be returning and not purchasing from this buyer again.

评论概述: Cute and flattering, shorter than I'd normally wear
评论详情: I bought this dress to wear out on a date. This product arrived far earlier than expected and fits me beautifully. I'm 5'2", 155 lbs, and curvy--the waistline hits in a flattering spot under my bust and I really feel myself while I'm wearing it. However, it is definitely shorter than I'd typically wear. I'd warn short, similarly busty girls of this issue, or anyone taller than me, regardless of frame. Otherwise, really great dress!

评论概述: Very cute but one wrong move and everything is exposed
评论详情: It is very cute but you have to wear something underneath to protect you. It’s very short

I was a little nervous purchasing this because usually skirts already stop short on my butt and this is meant to be short, but it was perfect! I wouldn't recommend bending over for anything or at least wearing shorts but it's probably one of my favorite dresses now! It's super cute and flattering I just want an excuse to wear it again.
Just the worst looking dress I've ever tried on. It was an instant return.

I LOOOVEEE this dress! I think this is the most comfortable and most flattering dress I've ever bought (coming from someone who is extremely body conscious). I am 5"3' and 175~180 pounds and bought the XL. I don't have a big chest but I do have a broad back and this fits extremely well.  The fabric has a slight stretch to it and is so nice and soft. I usually have a hard time with tops that button at the back of the neck but it was very roomy and comfortable, where closures like that normally make me feel like I'm being choked.  Only thing is yes, it is very short, the bottom of the dress literally is aligned with the bottom of my butt lol. You'll definitely need leggings with this. But otherwise I really love this dress so so much. Very flattering for someone who has a hard time dressing their larger body.  **belt was purchased separately, does not come with the dress**
Way better quality then i thought it would be. If you got a booty it will ve short but still covers

After reading the reviews I don't feel as alone. When I tried it on it fit amazingly but it didn't cover my but at all I barley even bent over and everything was exposed and I hated wearing shorts under dresses so Def not for me, returning as soon as possible
My daughter absolutely loves this dress! She is tall and thin. It was perfect with a pair of maroon tights.

I honestly was expecting to return the dress but it fits amazing! My only issue is the length in the back is a little short. Other than that, it zipped nicely and I feel secure and still have wiggle room waist up. Probably a perfect fit sizing up if you have bigger hips. I have been wearing my skirts with tights and shorts so I think this dress is perfect as is for me. (I hope this can help someone pick a size! bought xl, 5'7,185-190lb)
